text: We may also collect similar information from emails sent to you which then help us track which emails are opened and which links are clicked by recipients.

To improve your overall experience with the Services, we may use cookies, device identifiers, and similar technologies such as pixels, web beacons, and local storage for the following purposes: to improve the functionality of the Services, to remember your online preferences within the Services, and to help us better understand how you interact with the Services.
